title: Morphee1994
author: Morphee1994
content: Hello everybody i am desperatly seaching for someone from Nigeria that as a Bank account and a ID ( to register his own crypto account ) , to make a crypto Arbitrage. He doesn't have to put a penny ( I will take the risks ) and i'll Plit 50/50 with him. MP or reply here if you are interested . and i actually know it does sound shady , but i don't know how to present it it otherwise . Nice day to all !

comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: Quote from: Morphee1994 on April 04, 2023, 08:43:08 AMHello everybody i am desperatly seaching for someone from Nigeria that as a Bank account and a ID ( to register his own crypto account ) , to make a crypto Arbitrage. He doesn't have to put a penny ( I will take the risks ) and i'll Plit 50/50 with him. MP or reply here if you are interested . and i actually know it does sound shady , but i don't know how to present it it otherwise . Nice day to all ! Yes, It sounds shady. Want to know why?- Newbie- No trusts- Account was just opened two days ago- No introduction. You are a ghost. If anything goes south, no one can get a hold of you but you require the identity of a Nigerian- Are you a Nigerian, Amerian, Indian, Japanese?Sorry if no one is foolish enough to respond to you, our name has been dragged in the mud for too long and often times for crimes we didn't commit. So, we are very careful with how we deal with strangers.I hope you understand.

comments.author: MainIbem
comments.body: If i must tell you the truth you have to be a Nigerian because creating an account on the forum and directly searching for Nigerian who make a KYC for you is somewhat suspicious and very bloody for someone to just come to the Nigerian local board to say such thing.Besides none knows if you are Nigerian or not, But why would you look for a Nigerian to help pass through all this process.

comments.author: uchegod-21
comments.body: Who will take charge of the account, you right? Because you are the one doing the arbitrage trading.What if after opening the account and completing KYC you lock the person out, what will the person do?Tag your worthless newbie account I guess?Then, why the interest in Nigeria? Do we have profitable exchanges or rates or just for your natural love for Nigerians?Quote from: Morphee1994 on April 04, 2023, 08:43:08 AMHe doesn't have to put a penny ( I will take the risks ) and i'll Plit 50/50 with him. You are notntaking the risk. Someone completing the KYC is the one taking the risk.

comments.author: Smartvirus
comments.body: Quote from: Morphee1994 on April 04, 2023, 08:43:08 AMI actually know it does sound shady , but i don't know how to present it it otherwise . Yeah, e dey shady enough to make people ask questions, questions like;You no dey Nigeria like this?Watin dey stop you from going to the bank and open an account yourself, why you prefer another person details to your own?Why you goblke share when you fit open for yourself and collect all the money yourself?Watin be the gbege way fit come out for this matter way you wan hide your head from?The matter be say, if e sure for you, you git just go run am yourself and get the benefits of being a sole person for your own doings. Make you no con take risk with person you no even sabi kwa and then, the person go end up reaping you.  The risk just dey everywhere.

comments.author: martyns
comments.body: Quote from: MainIbem on April 06, 2023, 12:09:28 PMIf i must tell you the truth you have to be a Nigerian because creating an account on the forum and directly searching for Nigerian who make a KYC for you is somewhat suspicious and very bloody for someone to just come to the Nigerian local board to say such thing.Besides none knows if you are Nigerian or not, But why would you look for a Nigerian to help pass through all this process.I swear,e dey too suspicious and shady as you talkam,how you go open account recently and you Don come Naija board don begin dey ask for who from Naija here, meanwhile you see say we dey use pidgin here that is to say mostly everybody in this board na Nigerian,you come dey ask that kind question,everybody supposed dey very careful because some persons that you feel are part of this board only come here to scam people and rip them of their money.I pray say nobody fall a prey of this trap Sha,and na only who dey too eager to get quick money go fall for this one.

comments.author: MainIbem
comments.body: Quote from: martyns on April 07, 2023, 07:54:06 AMQuote from: MainIbem on April 06, 2023, 12:09:28 PMIf i must tell you the truth you have to be a Nigerian because creating an account on the forum and directly searching for Nigerian who make a KYC for you is somewhat suspicious and very bloody for someone to just come to the Nigerian local board to say such thing.Besides none knows if you are Nigerian or not, But why would you look for a Nigerian to help pass through all this process.I swear,e dey too suspicious and shady as you talkam,how you go open account recently and you Don come Naija board don begin dey ask for who from Naija here, meanwhile you see say we dey use pidgin here that is to say mostly everybody in this board na Nigerian,you come dey ask that kind question,everybody supposed dey very careful because some persons that you feel are part of this board only come here to scam people and rip them of their money.I pray say nobody fall a prey of this trap Sha,and na only who dey too eager to get quick money go fall for this one. No be say him even introduce him self oo make e be like say na our countri person maybe from one of our t neighborhoring state and also follow us yan some kind things wey dey happened for we board make e be like say we go reason the matta first before him for do this kind thing. But any way no issuea because I believe him no get plans for us because if anything happened for the industry we go get bad names which may affect our struggling for years to achieve this our local board.Abeg make una shift that user one corner make im go stay there first. Beside we no even know where him from self.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: The guy man don disappear after asking the question oohh. Em open em btt account because this question wey em ask like this for the Naija board. The moment em open am, em no take time to rush hia to ask peso wey go help am to register crypto account. As em no get better answer for who go help am out, em come disappear on that same day wey em create this em account. Till now, em never show face again for the forum. This attitude of his, shows sae em get bad agenda for the forum. He can't just bash into our Naija board like that without introduction to ask this kind yeye question. Knowing sae person no suppose to the reveal em identity for crypto like that give strange no matter the amount wey d involve. Em think sae wey be dullard or what? The thing don vex me

comments.author: Silver005
comments.body: Well it would have been very nice,if you mean what you said and not having different plans against your beautiful words you wrote here, but things are not like the way we are seeing it actually, people have given up in trusting people because of the past experiences and what they have seen else where and no one is trusted anymore,Your offer was such a nice one but the world is evilAnd again please why only Nigerian no any other countries or do you think Nigerian are the poorest country in the world?No I don't believe that,or are you a Nigerian and want to help your fellow Nigerian?And moreover your identity was not disclose,so as to identify your are a good Samaritan..In other words can you mentioned people you have helped through this method or otherwise,so we can be able to ascertain the facts about you..

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: See us see mata o. I checked OP profile I noticed say after that day OP create this post on April 04, 2023, 09:05:38 AM  him no come online again till this very moment as I dey type so and na only this topic him don create with this account. I dey feel say that guy wan run person street or the guy fit don run person street already and want to use somebody identity here for KYC run package to cover up him trace so that if casala burst nobody go see am make e be sy na the identity for the account naim Dem go face.For the issue of OP identity, I dey feel say OP na Nigerian because for OP to come here come request for person wey go run identity for am for new account meaning say him na country man and him know how things dey go in here.

comments.author: Techguysally
comments.body: How on earth will you come here and be asking for such bro those that even make sense to you? In this situation we are in this country Haba bro e no make sense, okay as per say the country get as e be bro as you the type this here e no heavy you? I’m a newbie here too I won’t or advice anyone to fall for this trap please.

comments.author: Fiatless
comments.created_time: April 09, 2023, 06:51:26 PMLast edit: April 11, 2023, 06:25:53 AM by Fiatless
comments.body: Quote from: Morphee1994 on April 04, 2023, 08:43:08 AMHello everybody i am desperatly seaching for someone from Nigeria that as a Bank account and a ID ( to register his own crypto account ) , to make a crypto Arbitrage. He doesn't have to put a penny ( I will take the risks ) and i'll Plit 50/50 with him. MP or reply here if you are interested . and i actually know it does sound shady , but i don't know how to present it it otherwise . Nice day to all ! Baba you feel say you go just enter for this kabal com dey yan apata. Guy Naija people eye do tear sote we dey see you both physically and spiritually. Now now you don dey talk about 50/50 profit for business wey we never even start sef. The next thing you go ask for BVN and password. Anybody wey fall mugu for this newbie dey greedy because I never even fit trust myself finish na to trust person wey just appear like Wiliwili for Naija arena. OP abeg fine way dey research, read, post and if God help you get merit. From there you fit get one campaign wey go dey drop small small thing for your hand wey you go use by bolle and fish hold belle. Advice no be curse oh. But if you want continue with this style, omo very soon them go dive and nack you out for this ama.

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: I guess say OP forget say all of us dey na Naija,even himself OP na Naija. All this kind people no get good intention for mind come this forum. Instead na bad motive make him register for this forum. OP intention don blind fold am to forget say na Bitcoin forum e dey wey he for use this opportunity learn about bitcoin and stop all those him fishery games wey he won come play here. Anyway sha,this place dey base on trust and say we be anonymous no mean say we no wise. I blame the person wey introduce am to this forum.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Merit.s on April 09, 2023, 07:44:46 PMI guess say OP forget say all of us dey na Naija,even himself OP na Naija. All this kind people no get good intention for mind come this forum. Instead na bad motive make him register for this forum. OP intention don blind fold am to forget say na Bitcoin forum e dey wey he for use this opportunity learn about bitcoin and stop all those him fishery games weys he won come play here. Anyway sha, this place dey base on trust and say we be anonymous no mean say we no wise. I blame the person wey introduce am to this forum.The fact that this kind of scammy attempt could lure newbies is enough for the old to receive multiple red tags for this offer, which has nothing but bad inattention that could lead to anyone involved in this deal getting their bank account tag and banned by banks who already may have place flags on the source of the money, I advise everyone to stay away from this no matter the amount of money the ops is willing to offer. This will end you in trouble with the authorities I have had hard cases like this before and most times the after mat result is unbearable for the parties involved. So everyone is careful and stays safe out there, thos so-called scammers are ready to take advantage of any gullible person do take heed and don't feed their evil lifestyle.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Forever101 on April 21, 2023, 04:29:13 AM😂🤣😂🤣😂🤣😂🤣 what is he looking for exactly. Nigeria Is made up of intelligent people and cannot be fooled by any of this tricky stuff. Bro, you have said it allThe ops are a joncing guy, and for him to have thought that he could get someone to run such a shady deal here on bitcointalk baffles me, even though he knows that this is a Bitcoin discussion forum and every member here is well informed about security measures and have high regard for privacy, so for ops to come here to look for someone he can use their bank account for a possible scam is something that is unreasonable for me to comprehend this level of gullibility. Thank goodness he is already red tag and that serves him right we all need to put that account on ignore list, because ops are just a Cheap scammer looking for who to drag down with him, but we are smarter than that here.

comments.author: Belarge
comments.body: Oga e sound shady na, you just join the forum and you dey find who get Bank account with ID, Oga you you no get account? Why you no use your own account bro,And you even dey say na you go buy the crypto and you still share 50/50 with the person wey get account, bro this one just be like scam shall, I no go lie you,And I no think say anybody for here go dey interested at all..
